summary: An archery starter shack for a new archer in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Change Log: Updated NPC, Fixed Some Issues. 

This mod equips Riverwood with a new shack, called Ghromit\'s Hideout. Inside you\'ll find arrows, some gear, and a few coins to get you on your way. 

Thought I\'d throw this together and see how it turned out. Nice starter for new Archers to Skyrim. Was working on a big house for your dragonborn but unfortunately had to start over.

Coming Soon: Thor\'s Palace. Dragonborn House.
author: Ghromit
